name: Shrumblo and the magical Grumblo (itch)
description:
Woah! Scrumblo's adventure finally begins!

This is a short project for a gamejam where the theme was "only one enemy". So I settled on an arcade type game where you lead one enemy that infinitely peruses you into spike traps to earn points.

I can't do music or art so I used free music and little ms paint doodles for the art. I really just focused on a fun arcady gameplay loop and according to my playtesters, it's really fun. So try it out for fun gameplay if you like that.

Something special happens if you get 50 points

Thumbnail is from @ooftroop on twitter
